docs.snippet: Richard Rodgers, the world renowned composer, died at his East Side home in Manhattan at 10:28 P.M. on Sunday. He was 77 years old. A spokesman for the family said the funeral service would be private....
docs.lead_paragraph: Richard Rodgers, the world renowned composer, died at his East Side home in Manhattan at 10:28 P.M. on Sunday. He was 77 years old. A spokesman for the family said the funeral service would be private.

headline.main: Richard Rodgers, Who Composed 'South Pacific' and 'Oklahoma!', Dies; Compares Collaborators 39 Musicals on Broadway 'Pipeline to Heaven' Studied Under Damrosch Changes in the 30's Success of 'South Pacific' Post at Lincoln Center
